verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> things <S%G1494>offered<s%> to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that we <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge.<s%> <S%G1108>Knowledge<s%> <S%G5448>puffs<s%> up, but <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G3618>edifies.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1380>think<s%> that he <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, he <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G3764>yet<s%> as he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G1097>know.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> is <S%G1097>known<s%> of him.

As <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G1035>eating<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things that are <S%G1494>offered<s%> in <S%G1494>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that an <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and that there is <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> but <S%G1520>one.<s%>

For <S%G1512>though<s%> there be that are <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2316>gods,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> in <S%G1093>earth,<s%> (as there be <S%G2316>gods<s%> <S%G4183>many,<s%> and <S%G2962>lords<s%> <S%G4183>many,<s%>)

But to us there is but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and we in him; and <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and we by him.

<S%G235>However,<s%> there is not in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G1108>knowledge:<s%> for <S%G5100>some<s%> with <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of the <S%G1497>idol<s%> to <S%G737>this<s%> <S%G737>hour<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> it as a thing <S%G1494>offered<s%> to an <S%G1494>idol;<s%> and their <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%> is <S%G3435>defiled.<s%>

But <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G3936>commends<s%> us not to <S%G2316>God:<s%> for <S%G3777>neither,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat,<s%> are we the <S%G4052>better;<s%> <S%G3777>neither,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat<s%> not, are we the <S%G5302>worse.<s%>

But take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> by <S%G3381>any<s%> <S%G4458>means<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>liberty<s%> of <S%G5216>your's<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a stumbling <S%G4348>block<s%> to them that are <S%G770>weak.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1492>see<s%> you <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2621>sit<s%> <S%G2621>at<s%> meat in the <S%G1493>idol's<s%> temple, shall not the <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of him which is <S%G772>weak<s%> be <S%G3618>emboldened<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G1494>offered<s%> to <S%G1494>idols;<s%>

But when you <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G5180>wound<s%> their <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> you <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1355>Why,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G4624>make<s%> my <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G4624>offend,<s%> I will <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2907>flesh<s%> while the <S%G165>world<s%> stands, <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I <S%G4624>make<s%> my <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G4624>offend.<s%>
